title: Create new select to major league roster transaction from Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a player that has no previous Selection transactions
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Create New' on player history
AND user selects "Selection to Major League Roster" for transaction type
custom_expected: THEN system will load new preliminary selection transaction

title: View an existing select to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a selection transaction on player history
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on selection transaction
custom_expected:
THEN selection transaction opens in view mode
AND "Close" button should be visible in grey

title: Save a select to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is creating a selection transaction
AND the form is in "Edit" Mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'Save'
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will save with a status of "Preliminary" if its the first time saving, otherwise status will not change
AND successful save message will display

title: Submit to BOC a select to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has finished creating a NEW selection transaction for a player 
AND has no fields missing
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'Submit to BOC'
custom_expected:
THEN status of transaction will become "Submitted to BOC"
AND an entry will made on player's player history in green

title: Update player's pending Org and Club and roster status on Submit of a ml roster transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user submits a selection transaction
custom_steps: WHEN transaction has been submitted successfully
custom_expected:
THEN player's pending Club is set to the ML Club
AND their minor league roster status is set to "Null"
AND the major league roster status is set to "Not to Report"

title: BOC receive an approval item when a selection to ml roster is submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club submitted a selection transaction to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user logs on
custom_expected:
THEN submitted selection transaction will be on the approvals widget
AND name and type will be a hyperlink
AND attached files, flags, and comments should be present on widget if on transaction

title: Edit an existing major league roster transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a selection transaction already available for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on selection transaction
custom_expected: THEN an edit button is present

title: BOC reject a major league roster transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a selection transaction has been submitted to the BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user opens up transaction
AND clicks Reject
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction is rejected
AND a notification is sent to the Club whom the player belongs

title: Approving a selection to MJ league roster transaction generates notification for LRD
custom_preconds: GIVEN a selection transaction is approved
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD MJC Admin user logs in (club-lrd-mjc-admin)
custom_expected: THEN it will be on their notification clipboard

title: Delete a Preliminary or a Rejected major league roster transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a preliminary or reject selection transaction
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens transaction
AND clicks delete
custom_expected:
THEN the item will be deleted
AND will not be searchable

title: BOC user cannot reverse a players previous approved major league roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has more than one approved selection transactions
custom_steps: WHEN a user tries to reverse a players previous selection transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive a message stating "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed"
AND user will only have the 'Back' option

title: BOC user suppresses a reversed selection to a major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a selection transaction has been reversed 
AND is opened
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks suppressed
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction becomes the status of suppressed
AND falls off any widgets

title: BOC user reverses a major league roster transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a selection transaction has been approved
custom_steps:
WHEN the BOC user opens up the selection transaction 
AND clicks reverse
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status becomes Reversed
AND displays as "Voided" on the player's player history

title: User cancels the creation or changes made to a selection major league roster transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a selection transaction open making changes to it
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks cancel
AND clicks Yes to message
custom_expected: THEN user is brought back to screen they were previously on

title: Club receives notification if selection to major league roster is approved, rejected or reversed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC approves, rejects, or reverses a selection transaction
custom_steps:
WHEN the club that the player belongs to logs in
AND views their notification widget
custom_expected: THEN they will see the transaction on it

title: BOC user can approve a major league roster transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a transaction has been submitted to the BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN the BOC opens up a submitted transaction
AND clicks Approve
custom_expected: THEN the transactions get the status of Approved

title: Club receives action item if selection to ML roster transaction has been submitted requires MJ Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a the player does NOT have a MJ contract in the status of Terms Submitted/Ready for Signature or higher
custom_steps: WHEN a selection transaction is submitted for that player
custom_expected: THEN an action item will appear for the selected Club

title: User see "Player to Replace" dropdown on selection to ml roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player has an outright transaction in his history 10 days prior to creation date
AND the outright is between MJL club's first and last day of the system
custom_steps: WHEN a selection transaction is being created
custom_expected:
THEN a "Player to Replace" dropdown will appear on the transaction
AND a list of player arranged alphabetically will appear in the dropdown

title: Club receives error if trying to select an existing MJ League player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is currently a MJ League player
custom_steps:
WHEN Create New is clicked
AND a selection transaction is clicked
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error; "Player is already on the 40-man roster."

title: Receives error if there is NO value for the First and Last Game of Season for Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN the system dates have been set to null for the First and Last game of a season for a club
custom_steps:
WHEN Create New is clicked
AND a selection transaction is clicked for a player belonging to that Club
custom_expected:
THEN user receives an error; "The club (name) must have First Game and Last Game dates entered in Club Season dates. Please contact BOC."
AND a 'Back' button is the only one present 
AND if clicked, brings user back to point of entry

title: Club should NOT be able to create a select of ml roster transaction for a player from a diff club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Arizona
AND a NYY player is opened
custom_steps:
WHEN Create New is clicked
AND a selection transaction is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive an error; "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization"
AND a 'Back' button will be the only button present

title: Receive error if attempting to create a select to ML transaction between the reserve list and rule 5 system dates
custom_preconds: GIVEN the reserve list date and rule 5 draft dates are set to yesterday and tomorrow
custom_steps:
WHEN Create New is clicked
AND a selection transaction is clicked
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error; "A player cannot be assigned between the reserve list filing date and the end of the Rule 5 draft."

title: BOC user sees error if approving a selection with an assignment date after current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the assignment date on a submitted selection transaction is after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN the BOC clicks approve
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error; "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."

title: Club receives error if they submit or approve a player that has an unconditional release in the last 8 months
custom_preconds: GIVEN the current Org has created an unconditional release for a player in the last 8 months
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive a warning message  "Player was released in the last 8 months by your organization. See MLR 8."
AND only BOC will see "Clicking Ignore and Continue" button.

title: Receive an error if assignment date is on or between the reserve list date and the rule 5 draft
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the reserve list date and rule 5 draft dates are set to yesterday and tomorrow
AND a selection transaction is being created for a player
custom_steps:
WHEN the Assignment date is set to today's date
AND submit is clicked
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error; "Assignment Date entered must not be between the Reserve List date and the Rule 5 Draft"

title: Receive an error submitting a sign to ml roster transaction between the reserve list date and rule 5 draft
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a selection transaction has been saved but not yet submitted
AND the reserve list date and rule 5 draft dates are set to yesterday and tomorrow
custom_steps:
WHEN user re-opens Preliminary transaction 
AND submits it
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error; "This transaction cannot be submitted between the Reserve List Date and the Rule 5 Draft."

title: Receive an error if user has back or future dated selection to ml roster assignment date more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is creating a selection transaction
custom_steps:
WHEN user sets assignment day 10 or more days before or after current date
AND clicks submit
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error; "Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission."

title: Receive an error if user is creating a player without an active MN roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player does not have an active MN roster status 
AND a selection transaction has been created for them
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks submit
custom_expected: THEN receive an error; "(player name) must be active in the minors."

title: Receive a warning if the ML active or under control limit will be exceeded with the new sign to ml roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a clubs ML active or under control limit has been reached 
AND a selection transaction is being created for a player within that club
custom_steps: WHEN submit is clicked
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error; "The club (name) will exceed the Active List and Under Control limit."

title: Receive an error if the player created has a pending or approved transaction after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a selection transaction is being created for a player who has a previous pending or approved selection transaction with an assignment date in the future
custom_steps: WHEN submit is clicked
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error; "A transaction cannot occur before the date of (player name) latest approved or pending transaction, on (date)"

title: BOC sees flag on submitted selection form
custom_preconds: GIVEN the creation of a selection transaction for a player exceeds the Reserve List limit for a club
custom_steps:
WHEN submit is clicked 
AND the BOC logs in to view the submitted transaction
custom_expected: THEN they will see a flag on the transaction

title: Clicking flag opens a popover
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag has been set on a selection transaction
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user places mouse over Flag
custom_expected: THEN a popover with rule violation displays

title: Flags display on approvals widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag has been set for a selection transaction
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user views their approvals widget
custom_expected: THEN they will see a flag next to the selection transaction item

title: User can print the life insurance form for selection to major league roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an approved selection transaction
AND pop ups are allowed
custom_steps:
WHEN print is clicked
AND they select Insurance Form
custom_expected: THEN life insurance form will export in an attached PDF

title: General
BOC- Admin
BOC- Basic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has logged in (club-boc-tx-mj/Baseball14)
AND knows a player that has a Selection tx that contains file attachments and flags
custom_steps: WHEN user opens selection tx for that player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to see flags and files attached
AND in any state of the tx

title: Club- Admin
Club- Basic
Create New dropdown should default to player's level of play
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a MAJOR league player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'Create New' from player history
custom_expected: THEN "Major" radio button under transactions should be defaulted

title: View player's MLS in their fixed player header
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user opens up a player's player history, their transactions and contracts
custom_steps: WHEN they view the header
custom_expected:
THEN it should match the layout of the wireframe http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=player_history
AND be consistent with ebis1

title: View Major League Roster widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user or a BOC user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN they select the roster tab
custom_expected: THEN the MJ League Roster should be there

title: View an existing major/minor outright
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a major/minor outright transaction in their player history
custom_steps: WHEN user opens up transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user can view the transaction
AND a 'Close' button will be present in grey

title: Create new major/minor outright through player history
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user opens up a players player history
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the 'Create New' button
AND selects the "Major/Minor Outright" transaction
custom_expected: THEN a new transaction will open if there are no previous preliminary, submitted, or rejected outrights for that player

title: Save major/minor outright
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the process of creating an outright transaction for a player
custom_steps: WHEN save is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN transaction will receive the status of Preliminary 
AND a successful save message will display

title: See "Player Given Contemplated Outright Form" checkbox on major/minor outright
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player has 3 or more years of ML service as of the assignment date, but less than 5 years
AND/OR player's super two year is the current year, and does not have 5 or more years of MLS
AND/OR player is flagged as having a prior outright, and does not have 5 or more years of MLS
custom_steps:
WHEN an outright transaction is being created for player
AND one or more of the above criteria is met
custom_expected: THEN "Player Given Contemplated Outright Form" checkbox is required

title: See "Obtained Player's Written Consent" checkbox on major/minor outright
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has 5 or more years of ML service as of the assignment date
custom_steps:
WHEN an outright is being created 
AND player meets above criteria
custom_expected: THEN the "Obtained Player's Written Consent" checkbox is required

title: Submit an outright to BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is creating an outright transaction for a player 
AND is ready to submit it to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks submit
custom_expected:
THEN successful submit message appears
AND transaction appears in green on players player history

title: BOC user receives an Approval item on clipboard when outright is submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN an outright transaction has reached "Submitted to BOC"
custom_steps: WHEN a BOC user logs in and views their approval widget
custom_expected:
THEN the submitted outright transaction will be there
AND a comments button will be populated if present on transaction
AND flags will be populated if present on transaction
AND a paper clip will be populated if attached files are present on transaction

title: BOC user approves major/minor outright transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an outright has been submitted
AND a BOC user logs in
custom_steps:
WHEN outright is opened
AND user clicks 'Approve'
custom_expected:
THEN a successful blue notification will be displayed
AND players minor league status will be set to Active
AND players ML status will be set to Null
AND players prior outright flag will be set 
AND players destination club will be set

title: Submitting a major/minor outright to BOC should update player's pending Org and Club and Roster status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has submitted an outright transaction to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN transaction is successfully submitted
custom_expected:
THEN players pending club is set to "Assign To"
AND players minor league roster status is set to "Active"
AND players major league roster status is set to "Null"

title: Receive an error if attempting to create an outright for a player at MN level
custom_preconds: GIVEN you have a MN league player
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Create New'
AND select Major/Minor Outright
custom_expected: THEN user receives error; "This transaction is for Major League players only."

title: Receive an error if player does not have valid MJ Roster Status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have a valid MJ league roster status
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Create New'
AND select Major/Minor Outright
custom_expected: THEN user receives error; "(name) must be Active, Not to Report, Not yet reported, Active Pending contract or Designated for Assignment to be assigned."

title: Receive an error if attempting to create an outright for a player that does not have an outright waiver in effect
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have an outright waiver in effect
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Create New'
AND select Major/Minor Outright
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error; "Outright assignment waivers must be in effect for this assignment"

title: Receive an error for attempting to create an outright for a player not belonging to Org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as Arizona
AND has a NYY player open
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Create New'
AND select Major/Minor Outright
custom_expected:
THEN user receives an error, "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."
AND only a 'Back' button is present

title: Receive an error attempting to submit an outright transaction that is between 3 days prior and the rule 5 draft
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an outright has been created 
AND it is between 5pm EST on the third day prior to the start of the rule 5 draft and the rule 5 draft date
custom_steps: WHEN submit or approved is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN user receives an error; "A major league player may not be outrighted to the minors during the closed Rule 5 roster period."
AND a 'Back' and an 'Ignore and Continue'(for BOC only) button will be present

title: Receive an error if user has back or future dates for outright assignment more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN an outright is being created with the assignment date set to 10 or more days prior to the current date
custom_steps: WHEN submit or approve is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN user receives an error; "Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission."
AND a 'Back' and an 'Ignore and Continue'(for BOC only) button will be present

title: Receive an error when creating an outright for a player who has a pending or approved transaction currently
custom_preconds: GIVEN an outright is being created for a player with an assignment date set that conflicts with a previous pending or approved outright transaction
custom_steps: WHEN submit or approve is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN user receives an error; "A transaction cannot occur before the date of (name)'s latest approved or pending transaction, on (date)"
AND an 'Ignore and Continue'(for BOC only) and a 'Back' button are present

title: Receive a warning if the MN league club's active or under control will be exceeded with the outright transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN an outright transaction is being created for a club who's active or under control limit is being exceeded
custom_steps: WHEN submit or approve is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN user receives an error; "The club (name) will exceed the Active list or Under Control Limit."
AND a 'Back' button and an 'Ignore and Continue'(for BOC only) button will be present

title: Receive an error when attempting to submit an outright without the Player Given Contemplated Outright Form checkbox checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an outright transaction is being created for a player that has the "Player Given Contemplated Outright Form" checkbox on it
AND the checkbox is NOT checked
custom_steps: WHEN submit or approve is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN user receives an error; "(name) must be given contemplated outright form for this assignment."
AND a 'Back' button and an 'Ignore and Continue'(for BOC only) button is present

title: Receive an error when attempting to submit an outright without the Player's Written Consent checkbox checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an outright transaction is being created for a player who has the "Obtained Player's Written Consent" checkbox on it 
AND checkbox is NOT checked
custom_steps: WHEN submit or approve is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN user receives an error; "(name) needs to give written consent for this assignment."
AND an 'Ignore and Continue'(for BOC only) button and a 'Back' button will be present
